package_info.name: Enterprise Package
package_info.tagline: Complete done-for-you lead generation system with unlimited AI and dedicated support
package_info.value_claim: Enterprise capabilities at small business prices. Replaces $100k+/year in agency fees + staff.

seo.title: Enterprise Package - Custom Pricing | Full-Service Lead Generation | Capture Client
seo.meta_description: Unlimited AI Voice Agents, unlimited calls, Google + Facebook Ads, custom landing pages, and dedicated account manager. Enterprise-grade lead generation for serious businesses.

hero.headline: Enterprise-Grade Lead Generation System
hero.subheadline: Unlimited AI Agents + Both Google & Facebook Ads + Custom Landing Pages + Dedicated Account Manager

ideal_for.headline: Perfect For:
audience: Multi-location businesses needing AI for each location
Organizations requiring white-glove service and dedicated support
Companies wanting a complete done-for-you marketing solution
Businesses that need both Google AND Facebook advertising

features_included.name: Unlimited AI Voice Agents
features_included.description: As many AI agents as you need - one for each service, location, or campaign. Fully customized for your business.

features_included.name: Unlimited Phone Calls
features_included.description: No call limits. Handle as many inbound calls as your business generates. Perfect for high-volume businesses.

features_included.name: Both Google & Facebook Ads
features_included.description: Run simultaneous campaigns on Google Ads AND Facebook/Instagram. Dominate search and social media.

features_included.name: LinkedIn Ads (Optional)
features_included.description: Add LinkedIn advertising for B2B lead generation. Perfect for professional services and enterprise sales.

features_included.name: Ad Spend Management: $3,000+/month
features_included.description: We manage any ad budget size. Most enterprise clients invest $5K-$20K/month in ad spend for maximum lead generation.

features_included.name: Custom Landing Pages
features_included.description: We build custom, high-converting landing pages from scratch. Designed specifically for your ads and target audience.

features_included.name: Advanced Lead Qualification + Routing
features_included.description: Sophisticated AI qualification with intelligent routing. Hot leads go to sales, warm leads get nurture sequences, cold leads filtered out.

features_included.name: Dedicated Account Manager
features_included.description: Your own account manager who knows your business inside-out. Direct phone and email access - no ticket systems.

features_included.name: 24/7 Priority Support
features_included.description: Round-the-clock priority support with same-day response guarantee. Direct Slack channel with our team.

features_included.name: Real-Time Dashboard
features_included.description: Custom dashboard showing live ad performance, calls, leads, conversions, and ROI. Access anytime from any device.

features_included.name: Bi-Weekly Strategy Calls
features_included.description: Regular strategy calls with your account manager to review performance, optimize campaigns, and plan growth.

features_included.name: Unlimited Integrations
features_included.description: Connect to unlimited CRMs, marketing automation platforms, scheduling tools, and business software.

features_included.name: API Access
features_included.description: Full API access for custom integrations with your existing systems and workflows.

features_not_included.name: Nothing
features_not_included.note: Enterprise includes everything. This is our complete, all-inclusive package.

downgrade_prompt.headline: Not Ready for Enterprise?
downgrade_prompt.description: Growth Package includes 2 AI agents, unlimited calls, and Facebook Ads (Google Ads add-on available) for $950/mo.

value_proposition.headline: Why Enterprise Clients Choose Capture Client

benefits.title: Complete Done-For-You System
benefits.description: We handle everything - AI setup, ad campaigns, landing pages, lead routing, and optimization. You focus on closing deals.

benefits.title: Dedicated Partnership
benefits.description: Your account manager becomes an extension of your team. They understand your business, goals, and growth targets.

benefits.title: Maximum Lead Volume
benefits.description: No artificial limits on calls or AI agents. Built to scale with high-growth businesses generating hundreds of leads monthly.

benefits.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
benefits.description: SOC 2 compliant infrastructure, encrypted data, HIPAA available, and enterprise SLAs. Your data is protected.

testimonials.quote: We have 7 locations across Tennessee. Capture Client set up an AI agent for each location, manages our Google and Facebook ads, and we're now generating 400+ qualified leads per month. Our dedicated account manager is fantastic - feels like they work for us.
testimonials.author: Robert Thompson

testimonials.quote: The ROI is incredible. We're spending $12K/month on ads and the Enterprise package, but closing $180K+ in new business every month. The real-time dashboard lets me see exactly what's working. Best marketing investment we've ever made.
testimonials.author: Amanda Foster

faq.question: What's the typical investment for Enterprise?
faq.answer: Most Enterprise clients invest $2,997-$6,997/month for management + their ad spend budget ($3K-$20K/month). Final pricing depends on the number of AI agents, ad platforms, and level of customization needed. We'll create a custom proposal during your consultation.

faq.question: How is Enterprise different from Growth?
faq.answer: Enterprise includes: unlimited calls and AI agents, BOTH Google and Facebook ads (vs choosing one), custom landing pages (vs optimization only), dedicated account manager, 24/7 support, and real-time reporting dashboard. It's built for businesses that need white-glove service and maximum lead generation.

faq.question: Do you require a long-term contract?
faq.answer: While we prefer 6-month commitments to allow time for optimization, we don't require multi-year contracts. Most enterprise clients stay long-term because the ROI is strong.

faq.question: Can you handle multiple locations?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We have multi-location clients with 2-20+ locations. Each location gets its own AI agent, local landing pages, and geo-targeted advertising.

faq.question: What industries do you work with?
faq.answer: We specialize in service-based businesses: home services (HVAC, plumbing, roofing), professional services (legal, medical, dental), and B2B services. If you take inbound calls and need more leads, we can help.

trust_signals.title: White-Glove Onboarding
trust_signals.description: Dedicated onboarding specialist for the first 30 days.

trust_signals.title: 90-Day Performance Guarantee
trust_signals.description: We guarantee measurable improvement in lead quality and volume.

trust_signals.title: Direct Communication
trust_signals.description: No ticket systems. Direct access to your account manager.
